name: AlloyCI
description: An open-source, Elixir based CI coordinator

MIX_ENV.description: Env to run the application in

RUNNER_REGISTRATION_TOKEN.description: Token that allows registration of global runners

SERVER_URL.description: Where AlloyCI will be running (probably https://<app name>.herokuapp.com/)

HOST.description: FQDN of where AlloyCI will be running

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of cookies

GITHUB_PRIVATE_KEY.description: GitHub Integration private key (download the file, and paste the contents here)

GITHUB_INTEGRATION_URL.description: The URL of your integration, so users can install it
